Verses: 1 yoseppu Paarvonidaththil Poi: En Thagappanum En Sagodhararum, Thangal Aadumaadugalodum Thangalukku Undaana Ellaavatrodunkoodak Kaanaandhesaththilirundhu Vandhaargal; Ippozhudhu Kosen Naattil Irukkiraargal Endru Solli;
2 than Sagodhararil Aindhuperaip Paarvonukku Munbaagak Kondupoi Niruththinaan.

3 paarvon Avanudaiya Sagodhararai Nokki: Ungal Thozhil Enna Endru Kettaan; Adharku Avargal: Umadhu Adiyaaraagiya Naangalum Engal Pidhaakkalum Mandhai Meykkiravargal Endru Paarvonidaththil Sonnadhumandri,

4 kaanaan Thesaththile Panjam Kodidhaayirukkiradhu; Umadhu Adiyaarin Mandhaigalukku Meychchal Illaamaiyaal, Idhdhesaththile Thangavandhom; Umadhu Adiyaaraagiya Naangal Kosen Naattile Kudiyirukkumbadi Dhayavuseyyavendum Endru Vendikkondaargal.
5 appozhudhu Paarvon Yoseppai Nokki: Un Thagappanum Un Sagodhararum Unnidaththil Vandhirukkiraargale.

6 egipthudhesam Unakku Munbaaga Irukkiradhu; Dhesaththilulla Nalla Idaththile Un Thagappanaiyum Un Sagodhararaiyum Kudiyerumbadi Sey; Avargal Kosen Naattile Kudiyirukkalaam; Avargalukkulle Thiramaiyullavargal Undendru Unakkuth Therindhirundhaal, Avargalai En Aadumaadugalai Visaarikkiradharkuth Thalaivaraaga Vaikkalaam Endraan.
7 pinbu, Yoseppu Than Thagappanaagiya Yaakkobai Azhaiththukkonduvandhu, Avanaip Paarvonukku Munbaaga Niruththinaan. Yaakkobu Paarvonai Aaseervadhiththaan.
8 paarvon Yaakkobai Nokki: Umakku Vayadhu Enna Endru Kettaan.

9 adharku Yaakkobu: Naan Paradhesiyaaich Sanjariththa Naatkal Nootrumuppadhu Varusham; En Aayusu Naatkal Konjamum Sanjalamulladhumaayirukkiradhu; Avaigal Paradhesigalaaich Sanjariththa En Pidhaakkaludaiya Aayusu Naatkalukku Vandhu Ettavillai Endru Paarvonudane Sonnaan.
10 pinnum Yaakkobu Paarvonai Aaseervadhiththu, Avan Samugaththilindru Purappattupponaan.
11 paarvon Kattalaiyittabadiye, Yoseppu Than Thagappanukkum Than Sagodhararukkum Egipthudhesaththile Nalla Naataagiya Raamases Ennum Naattile Sudhandhiram Koduththu, Avargalaik Kudiyetrinaan.
12 yoseppu Than Thagappanaiyum Than Sagodhararaiyum Than Thagappanudaiya Kudumbaththaar Anaivaraiyum, Avaravargal Kudumbaththirkuththakkadhaai Aagaaram Koduththu Aadhariththuvandhaan.
13 panjam Migavum Kodidhaayirundhadhu; Dhesamengum Aagaaram Kidaiyaamalpoyitru; Egipthudhesamum Kaanaandhesamum Panjaththinaale Melindhupoyitru.
14 yoseppu Egipthudhesaththilum Kaanaandhesaththilumulla Panaththaiyellaam Dhaaniyam Kondavargalidaththil Vaangi, Adhaip Paarvon Aramanaiyile Kondupoich Serththaan.

15 egipthudhesaththilum Kaanaandhesaththilumulla Panam Selavazhindhapodhu, Egipthiyar Ellaarum Yoseppinidaththil Vandhu: Engalukku Aagaaram Thaarum; Panam Illai, Adhinaal Naangal Umadhu Samugaththil Saagavendumo Endraargal.
16 adharku Yoseppu: Ungalidaththil Panam Illaamalponaal, Ungal Aadumaadugalaik Kodungal; Avaigalukkup Padhilaaga Ungalukkuth Dhaaniyam Kodukkiren Endraan.

17 avargal Thangal Aadumaadu Mudhalaanavaigalai Yoseppinidaththil Konduvandhaargal; Yoseppu Kudhiraigalaiyum Aadugalaiyum Maadugalaiyum Kazhudhaigalaiyum Vaangikkondu, Andha Varusham Avargaludaiya Aadumaadu Mudhalaana Ellaavatrirkum Badhilaaga Avargalukku Aagaaram Koduththu, Avargalai Aadhariththaan.

18 andha Varusham Mudindhapin, Maruvarushaththile Avargal Avanidaththil Vandhu: Panamum Selavazhindhupoyitru; Engal Aadumaadu Mudhalaanavaigalum Engal Aandavanaich Serndhadhu; Engal Sareeramum Engal Nilamume Ozhiya, Engal Aandavanukku Munbaaga Meedhiyaanadhu Ondrum Illai; Idhu Engal Aandavanukkuth Theriyaadha Kaariyam Alla.

19 naangalum Engal Nilangalum Ummudaiya Kangalukku Munbaaga Azhindhu Pogalaamaa? Neer Engalaiyum Engal Nilangalaiyum Vaangikkondu, Aagaaram Kodukkavendum; Naangalum Engal Nilangalum Paarvonukku Aadheenamaayiruppom; Naangal Saagaamal Uyirodirukkavum, Nilangal Paazhaaip Pogaamalirukkavum, Engalukku Vidhaithdhaaniyaththaith Thaarum Endraargal.

20 appadiye Egipthiyar Thangalukkup Panjam Melittabadiyaal Avaravar Thangal Thangal Vayal Nilangalai Vitraargal; Yoseppu Egipthin Nilangal Yaavaiyum Paarvonukkaagak Kondaan; Ivvidhamaai Andhap Boomi Paarvonudaiyadhaayitru.
21 melum Avan Egipthin Oru Ellaimudhal Maru Ellaivaraikkumulla Janangalai Andhandhap Pattanangalil Kudimaarippogappanninaan.

22 aasaariyarudaiya Nilaththai Maaththiram Avan Kollavillai; Adhu Paarvonaale Aasaariyarukku Maaniyamaagak Kodukkappattirundhadhinaalum, Paarvon Avargalukkuk Koduththa Maariyadhthinaale Avargal Jeevanam Pannivandhadhinaalum, Avargal Thangal Nilaththai Virkavillai.
23 pinnum Yoseppu Janangalai Nokki: Idho, Indru Ungalaiyum Ungal Nilangalaiyum Paarvonukkaaga Vaangikkonden; Idho, Ungalukkuk Kodukkappadugira Vidhaith Dhaaniyam, Idhai Nilaththil Vidhaiyungal.

24 vilaivil Aindhil Oru Pangaip Paarvonukkuk Kodukkavendum; Matra Naalu Pangum Vayalukku Vidhaiyaagavum Ungalukkum Ungal Kudumbaththaarukkum Ungal Kuzhandhaikalukkum Aagaaramaagavum Ungaludaiyadhaayirukkattum Endraan.
25 appozhudhu Avargal: Neer Engal Piraananaik Kaappaatrineer; Engal Aandavanudaiya Kangalil Engalukkuth Dhayavu Kidaikkavendum; Naangal Paarvonukku Adimaigalaayirukkirom Endraargal.

26 aindhil Ondru Paarvonukkuch Serum Vaaram Endru Yoseppu Itta Kattalaipbadi Egipthu Dhesaththile Innaalvaraikkum Nadandhuvarugiradhu; Aasaariyarin Nilam Maaththiram Paarvonaich Seraamal Neengalaayirundhadhu.
27 isravelar Egipthu Dhesaththilulla Kosen Naattile Kudiyirundhaargal; Ange Nilangalaik Kaiyaatchi Seydhu, Migavum Palugip Peruginaargal.
28 yaakkobu Egipthu Dhesaththile Padhinezhu Varusham Irundhaan; Yaakkobudaiya Aayusu Naatkal Nootrunaarpaththezhu Varusham.

29 isravel Maranamadaiyum Kaalam Sameebiththadhu. Appozhudhu Avan Than Kumaaranaagiya Yoseppai Varavazhaiththu, Avanai Nokki: Enmel Unakkuth Dhayavundaanaal, Un Kaiyai En Thodaiyinkeezh Vaiththu Enmel Patchamum Unmaiyumullavanaayiru; Ennai Egipthile Adakkam Pannaadhiruppaayaaga.

30 naan En Pidhaakkalode Paduththukkollavendum; Aagaiyaal, Nee Ennai Egipthilirundhu Eduththukkondupoi, Avargalai Adakkampanniyirukkira Nilaththile Ennaiyum Adakkampannu Endraan. Adharku Avan: Umadhu Solbadi Seyven Endraan.
31 appozhudhu Avan: Enakku Aanaiyittukkodu Endraan; Avanukku Aanaiyittukkoduththaan. Appozhudhu Isravel Kattilin Thalaimaattile Saaindhu Thozhudhukondaan.
